5.text:
Welcome to the endless motivation channel
and today we’re doing questions and answers.

9.text:
Last week, you guys submitted questions about
motivation, life, goals, everything.

13.text: And now it’s time to discuss them.

14.text: Now I’m going to answer this week’s questions.

16.text:
If you want your questions answered leave
a comment down below and I’ll pick the top

20.text: 10 questions to talk about next week..

There’s pretty much no one around it if

49.text:
Rodrigo Serrano 1 day ago
how caan i lead my field? real state broker??

54.text:
:-)﻿
You need to learn to be an innovator.

56.text: Especially as a real estate broker.

57.text: Because there’s such a low barrier to entry.

61.text: Everyone becomes a real estate broker.

63.text:
So when you learn to innovate and set yourself
apart, that’s when you’ll become the leader

77.text: Are you looking for a shortcut?

82.text:
Marios Geo 1 day ago
What sacrifices do you have to do in order

85.text:
to be successful in both life(friends/sports)
and career(job/stydy)?

91.text:
I’m not going to sit here and cross things
off the list of your life.

96.text: My answers would probably be wrong.

98.text:
Only you know what the most important values
and activities are in your life.

105.text:
Dean Iangrai 22 hours ago
I'm currently studying law.

114.text:
i really dont mind what i do, I just want
to end up abroad and live life there.

118.text:
however, it's not possible due to financial
situations.

120.text: how do I get my dream to work?

124.text:
thank you.﻿
Moving is always tricky, especially if it’s

129.text:
I can tell you that the longer you wait to
move, the more difficult it becomes.

133.text:
If you take a job first, you’ll get an apartment,
friends, a lifestyle and it will be difficult

139.text:
The advantage is that you can save money and
build experience in your career.

142.text:
If you move immediately, it will be rocky,
but you’ll be where you need to be.

149.text:
Truman Holst 14 hours ago (edited)
Do you believe in the quote "Love what you

151.text: do until you do what you love ?" and why.

155.text:
Keep the good content :)﻿
I never heard that one before, but it’s

160.text:
It makes me think, keep working until you
can do what you really love to do.

164.text: And that is a good mentality to have.

166.text:
Because you won’t be doing what you love
immediately.

168.text: It takes time to build a life that you love.

173.text:
Remember you really need to look inside yourself
for the answers.

176.text:
Sometimes you need a nudge in the right direction,
but only you know what’s best for you.

180.text:
If I don’t get to your question I encourage
you to re-submit it each week and I’ll find

185.text:
If you already asked a question, you can ask
a different or more specific question.

188.text:
Questions can be anything on the topic of
success, failure, motivation, determination,

192.text: It can be short, long, specific, general.

193.text:
Or even if you just want to vent about something
you’ve been working on.

194.text:
The idea is that I want to start a discussion
and provide support.

198.text:
So submit your questions in the comments down
below and I’ll talk to you guys next week.
